notes: Patient has a history of CAD, CHF, obesity hypoventilation syndrome, obstructive sleep apnea, DM2, ventricular tachycardia, hypothyroidism, schizophrenia, COPD, and Pneumonia. Patient is currently on BiPap with 5L O2 and has been experiencing agitation, altered mental status, and hypoxia.
